about_the_game:
Embark on a casual yet captivating RPG adventure set in the lush, lore-rich world of "Echoes of the Ashen." In this single-player journey, you'll step into the shoes of a character from one of several unique classes - Spirit Whisperer, Jungle Stalker, Tribal Guardian, Void Binder, Rune Weaver - each with their own rich backstory and connection to the world. Your adventure unfolds on a dynamic map screen, the heart of your exploration, questing, and character customization.



Key Features:
*Vibrant World: Discover the ancient jungle island of the Ashen tribe, a land teeming with life, mystery, and tales of the void. Each location you explore is steeped in lore, waiting for you to uncover its secrets.
*Engaging Combat: Dive into streamlined dungeon crawling with intuitive turn-based skirmishes. Whether facing off against wild beasts or the enigmatic void creatures, your strategy and wit will be your greatest allies.
*Rich Storytelling: From the quests you undertake to the items you collect, every aspect of "Echoes of the Ashen" is infused with storytelling, inviting you into a world where every action and discovery contributes to the unfolding narrative.
*Accessible Adventure: Designed for both newcomers and veterans of the genre, the game offers a casual RPG experience, ensuring your adventure is as enjoyable as it is deep.

"Echoes of the Ashen" invites players of all kinds to lose themselves in an adventure that balances the simplicity of casual gameplay with the depth of RPG character building and storytelling.

Welcome to the world of "Echoes of the Ashen" - where the legacy of the ancients is yours to discover.

  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
